news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Recykal, an Indian clean-tech startup, has raised approximately $13 million in a pre-Series B funding round led by 360 One. Additionally, the company has partnered with Pashupati Group to promote eco-friendly manufacturing processes through sustainable recycled resins.

overview_description.description: Recykal is a digital technology company that provides cloud based solutions for Waste Management and Recycling Industry. Recykal’s digital platform connects Waste Generators like Businesses, Consumers, Waste Aggregators, Recyclers and enables transactions between them with transparency and traceability.

about_short_description.short_description: Recykal is an Indian clean-tech startup powering largest Circular Economy Marketplace in Asia.

product.name: Marketplace
product.description: A digital platform connecting buyers and sellers of recyclable materials, facilitating transactions for recycled plastic, paper, and metal.

product.name: EPR Solutions
product.description: Services designed to help businesses meet their Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) targets for plastic, e-waste, battery, and tyre waste with transparency and traceability.

product.name: Digital DRS
product.description: A system supporting government-led efforts to reduce littering by involving citizens, vendors, and retailers in waste management, ensuring precise waste data traceability.

product.name: Smart Centre Solutions
product.description: Technology-driven solutions for waste management centers, improving waste sorting infrastructure and operational control through digital workflows.

product.name: Rethink+
product.description: An educational program aimed at schools to promote sustainability through tailor-made content, gamified learning, and practical activities.

product.name: Traceable Plastic Recovery
product.description: A service enabling businesses to track and manage their industrial waste flow, supporting accurate reporting on ESG and SDG metrics.
